name: Soccer/football game including AI v5.7
description: This is a soccer game...... First type the name of the red team (Player 1). Then select your mode: 'Two player' or 'One player (AI)'. If you select 'Two player', type the name of the blue team. Then click on the 'START' button to start the game. If you select 'One player (AI)', click on the 'START' button to start the game. Use the arrow keys to move the red player. Use the 'WASD' keys to move the blue player (if the mode is 'Two player'). If the mode is 'One player (AI)', then the blue player will move automatically. Press the 'P' key to pause the game. Press the space bar key to resume the game.
